title: Ticket #4083: All tests should explicitly set desired DAEMON_LIST
description: All tests should set their desired DAEMON_LIST, or at least (perhaps in CondorPersonal.pm) ensure that the default is set to "MASTER,COLLECTOR,NEGOTIATOR,SCHEDD,STARTD". If a test just assumes that the template file is correct, it may fail if the system has chosen as a template file an unusually configured one. This wouldn't be a problem if it explicitly got the template file from condor_examples, but the current scripts nose around looking for a working install to swipe from.
creator: adesmet
